title: D. Description of Services to be Performed.

sections.content: Use additional sheets, if necessary, to complete this section.

List the proposed activities to be carried out with funds provided under the SFCA Contract, the dates and locations of the activities, the projected audience (children, general public, etc.), and the names of artists, scholars, educators,community resource persons, or other specialists directly involved in providing services specifically identified with the activity. Attach artist/professional profiles.
Below this, add a narrative of the project describing the nature of the activities and their goals.
